select ELIMP_SEQ.nextval from dual
insert into ELIMP values (#{electronicNo} , CURRENT_DATE, #{electronicTitle}, #{electronicContent}, #{electronicFileFlag}, #{electronicCompletFlag}, #{electronicEmergencyFlag}, #{empNo}, #{styleNo}, #{electronicDraft})
mapper.select: select MAX(electronic_no) from elimp where emp_no = #{empNo}
select a.* from elimp a join appline b on a.electronic_no = b.electronic_no where b.emp_no = #{empNo}

select count(*) from apEleList where EMP_NO_AP = #{empNo} and APPROVAL_LINE_COMPLETE_FLAG = 0 and ELECTRONIC_DRAFT = 0 and ELECTRONIC_COMPLET_FLAG !=2
order by ELECTRONIC_NO DESC

select count(*) from reEleList where EMP_NO_RE = #{empNo} and ELECTRONIC_DRAFT = 0
order by ELECTRONIC_NO DESC

select count(*) from apEleList where EMP_NO_AP = #{empNo} and APPROVAL_LINE_COMPLETE_FLAG = 1 and ELECTRONIC_DRAFT = 0
order by ELECTRONIC_NO DESC

select count(*) from elimp where EMP_NO = ${empNo} and ELECTRONIC_DRAFT = 0 and ELECTRONIC_COMPLET_FLAG = 0
order by ELECTRONIC_NO DESC

select count(*) from elimp where EMP_NO = ${empNo} and ELECTRONIC_DRAFT = 1
order by ELECTRONIC_NO DESC

select count(*) from elimp where ELECTRONIC_COMPLET_FLAG = 1 and ELECTRONIC_DRAFT = 0
order by ELECTRONIC_NO DESC

select count(*) from elimp where ELECTRONIC_COMPLET_FLAG = 2
order by ELECTRONIC_NO DESC
select STYLE_NO, ELECTRONIC_TITLE from ( select * from ELIMP where EMP_NO = #{empNo} order by ELECTRONIC_NO desc ) where rownum<6

select A.* from
